Datatable.LocalizationPair: A strong legal system eases disapproval that citizens have of other cities. Citizens stop hating other cities, and so other cities are more likely to approve of those expansions as well.

Show Cities only.
Cities can be traded in the following cases:
War status - You are proposing a truce treaty.
Peace status - You are proposing an alliance treaty.
Alliance status - Anytime.
A structure that removes the effects of expansion disapproval from the city it is built in.
Custom Units from other factions. Only 1 unit per tier may be added.
Doubles the income of strategic resources in exchange for all income of the strategic resource.
Grants the use of peace at 5x the cost, and alliance at 10x, from the start of the game.
